					 Info
					 Fleishman-Hillard EU Transparency Register 56047191389-84 First registered on 17 Mar 2009 Goals / Remit Fleishman-Hillard is one of the world's leading communications firms, with 2,300 employees working in 110 offices in 21 countries. Our public affairs practice offers the premier network dedicated to public affairs with over 500 specialised consultants in offices throughout Europe, Canada the US and Asia-Pacific. The Brussels office features a multinational and multilingual staff of 120, whose first-hand experience in European Union institutions, national governments, business and journalism make the firm one of Europe 's leading public affairs and communications agencies. Because of this unique cultural and linguistic mix, we also act as a “hub” for Fleishman-Hillard in Europe providing centralised management for our clients' European communication projects. Main EU files targeted Proposal on Substantiating Green Claims, Product Environmental Footprint, Access to vehicle data, Grids package, EU Textiles strategy, New consumer agenda, Proposal on excerpt: Check out all LobbyFacts data on Fleishman-Hillard as extracted from the EU lobby transparancy register. Fleishman-Hillard is one of the world's leading communications firms, with 2,300 employees working in 110 offices in 21 countries. Our public affairs practice offers the premier network dedicated to public affairs with over 500 specialised consultants in offices throughout Europe, Canada the US and Asia-Pacific. The Brussels office features a multinational and multilingual staff of 120, whose first-hand experience in European Union institutions, national governments, business and journalism make the firm one of Europe 's leading public affairs and communications agencies. Because of this unique cultural and linguistic mix, we also act as a “hub” for Fleishman-Hillard in Europe providing centralised management for our clients' European communication projects.
